name: Breaking Out (BigNoob546)
description:
NOTE THAT THIS GAME DOESN'T WORK ON ITCH.IO CURRENTLY, WORKING ON FIXING THAT. TO PLAY THE GAME GO TO https://bignoob546.github.io/Breaking-Out.

Welcome to Breaking Out! This is an amazing adventure game that can be played in the browser! Simply read the story, and choose an option! Have fun!
